messages.title: It's time for change
messages.content: Erewash needs an MP who will stand up for local people.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposition to HS2 and the impact it has on local communities.
Increase police numbers and restore cut services.
Opposition to cuts in school kitchen staff hours to maintain quality education.

issues.education: Opposition to cuts in school kitchen staff hours.

leaflet.personalStatement: For nine years we have had a Conservative Government that have pulled resources from Erewash. The local Conservative MP has consistently voted in favour of these cuts. I am proud to have served as a Labour candidate and have successfully campaigned against local issues affecting our area, including cuts to local services like the NHS, education and community hospitals. If I am elected as your MP, I will fight for the best for local people.

politicalExperience.achievements: Successfully campaigned against local issues such as cuts to local services like the NHS, education and community hospitals.

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Geoff Stratford on behalf of Catherine Atkinson both of 35 Portland Road Hill Top Eastwood Nottingham NG16 3AF

images.caption: Catherine Atkinson and Clir. James Dawson speak out against the damage HS2 will do to Erewash

examples: Under the Tories, 20,000 police officers have been axed and crime is rising at the fastest rate in a decade.
It's time for change. Erewash needs an MP who will stand up for local people.
Catherine Atkinson and Clir. James Dawson speak out against the damage HS2 will do to Erewash.
Opposition to HS2 and the impact it has on local communities.
Increase police numbers and restore cut services.
Opposition to cuts in school kitchen staff hours to maintain quality education.
Increase police numbers and restore cut services.

personalStories.story: Catherine is standing side by side with school kitchen staff and families who understand the importance of decent school dinners.

examples: Police numbers are down and crime is on the rise under this Tory Government.
335 fewer police in Derbyshire under the Tories.
Tory cuts mean that residents in Long Eaton are losing bus services.
If I am elected as your MP, I will fight for the best for local people.
